member.name: T:SS.SelectionChangedHandler
member.summary: The type of delegate used to register for SelectionChanged events

member.name: T:SS.SpreadsheetPanel
member.summary:
A panel that displays a spreadsheet with 26 columns (labeled A-Z) and 99 rows (labeled 1-99). Each cell on the grid can display a non-editable string. One of the cells is always selected (and highlighted). When the selection changes, a SelectionChanged event is fired. Clients can register to be notified of such events.
None of the cells are editable. They are for display purposes only.

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty SpreadsheetPanel

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.Clear
member.summary: Clears the display.

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.SetValue(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: If the zero-based column and row are in range, sets the value of that cell and returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.GetValue(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String@)
member.summary: If the zero-based column and row are in range, assigns the value of that cell to the out parameter and returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.SetSelection(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: If the zero-based column and row are in range, uses them to set the current selection and returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.GetSelection(System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Assigns the column and row of the current selection to the out parameters.

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.OnResize(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the SpreadsheetPanel is resized, we set the size and locations of the three components that make it up.

member.name: E:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.SelectionChanged
member.summary: The event used to send notifications of a selection change

member.name: T:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.Address
member.summary: Used internally to keep track of cell addresses

member.name: T:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.DrawingPanel
member.summary: The panel where the spreadsheet grid is drawn. It keeps track of the current selection as well as what is supposed to be drawn in each cell.

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.DrawingPanel.DrawColumnLabel(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Font)
member.summary: Draws a column label. The columns are indexed beginning with zero.

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.DrawingPanel.DrawRowLabel(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Font)
member.summary: Draws a row label. The rows are indexed beginning with zero.

member.name: M:SS.SpreadsheetPanel.DrawingPanel.OnMouseClick(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Determines which cell, if any, was clicked. Generates a SelectionChanged event. All of the indexes are zero based.

member.name: P:SS.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
